heading: The perfect air conditioning exists.
subheading: The world of perfect climate is at your fingertips with Naitec Stellair. Fresh air from outside, purified by the air conditioner from micro-impurities and allergens, and pleasantly cooled to suit your desires. You’re not dreaming, the future is here. Discover it.
why_info_item_1_description: Active ventilation allows air conditioners to draw in fresh air from the exterior, ensuring a constant supply of high-quality and purified air into the room. This system improves ventilation and contributes to a healthier and more comfortable indoor environment.
why_info_item_2_description: The draft-free, diffused cooling of the Stellair air conditioner ensures even and gentle distribution of cooled air throughout the room without unpleasant drafts. This system enhances comfort without the risk of catching a cold.
why_info_item_3_title: The quietest AC. No disturbing noise.
why_info_item_3_description: Just 18 decibels, like the ticking of a clock. In its quietest mode, Stellair is silent. Ideal for bedrooms, offices, and any space where peace and comfort matter. That is, every space.
why_info_item_4_description: UVC light completely eliminates all bacteria and viruses, while the ionizer removes dust, allergens, and other impurities. This combination of innovations in Naitec Stellair air conditioners creates a healthier and safer environment in your home.
why_info_item_5_description: Controlling the air conditioner via Wi-Fi allows for easy temperature, mode, and function adjustments through your smartphone or tablet from anywhere, anytime.
why_info_item_6_description: The high energy efficiency of the R32 refrigerant ensures more effective cooling and heating while significantly reducing environmental impact. It is the ideal choice for a more sustainable future.
all_you_need_item_1_description: Automatically cleans, sterilizes, and then disinfects its internal evaporator with UV light to keep your air fresh, free from bacteria and viruses.
all_you_need_item_1_long_description: When the 'sterilization' function is activated, the evaporator in the indoor unit first freezes and then heats up to 57°C, which, in combination with the UVC lamp and ionizer, ensures the cleaning of the indoor unit and the elimination of harmful bacteria. This technology gives your home a fresh feel and provides a healthy atmosphere without unnecessary negative effects.
all_you_need_item_2_description: The ability to efficiently heat even at temperatures as low as -15°C ensures a comfortable and pleasant environment even during colder winter days.
all_you_need_item_3_description: We prioritize quality, which is why Naitec Stellair offers a 5-year warranty to ensure long-term reliability.
all_you_need_item_3_long_description: The extended warranty is valid only if service maintenance is performed at least once a year by the supplier from whom you purchased the air conditioner.
all_you_need_item_4_description: Purchase the Lisa voice control for simple and convenient air conditioner operation using voice commands.
all_you_need_item_5_description: In the app, you can set the desired performance limit for the air conditioner, allowing you to save up to 70% energy.
fresh_air_title: Fresh and clean air even without open windows.
fresh_air_item_1_description: Naitec Stellair is equipped with a HEPA filter, which is especially beneficial for allergy sufferers. It captures dust, pollen, bacteria, and allergens, creating a cleaner and healthier environment.
fresh_air_item_2_description: Drawing in outside air not only improves sleep but also increases productivity by reducing CO2 levels indoors. For allergy sufferers, it provides relief by filtering the air from indoor allergens such as dust and pollen.
fresh_air_item_3_description: Just a few hours in an unventilated room and CO2 levels reach high concentrations, directly leading to fatigue and headaches. Air intake from outside eliminates these problems, protects your health, and improves the quality of both sleep and work.
